Params: {3: "You don't know how long you've been trekking on the snow-covered mountain..."}
{3: "You feel you're about to freeze when a campsite appears in the far distance."}
{3: 'It might not be the mission location as marked on the map, but...'}
{3: "If you don't get to warmth soon, you will probably lose a couple of toes."}
{3: 'Actually, the light in the distance seems a little too bright to be given off by a campfire.'}
{3: 'As you suspected, what lit up the campsite was not a campfire but an explosion.'}
{3: "Like all the refugees you've met before, these poor drifters are defenseless against the Corrupted."}
